    <field name="INLINE">AUTO</field>

    <statement name="INPUTS">

        <field name="INPUTNAME">NAME</field>

        <statement name="FIELDS">
          <block type="field_static" id="X[+Yk))8^K^PsRbs{-*D">
            <field name="TEXT">new discord client</field>
          </block>
        </statement>
        <value name="TYPE">
          <shadow type="type_null" id="e4nPwr%^uMF_a*@YsA/="></shadow>

    <value name="COLOUR">

clientoption_messagecachemaxsize:
<xml xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">
  <block type="factory_base" id="HD+Bt1$0|`x:/m*u(=3N" deletable="false" movable="false" x="0" y="0">
    <mutation connections="BOTH"></mutation>
    <field name="NAME">ClientOption_messageCacheMaxSize	</field>
    <field name="INLINE">AUTO</field>
    <field name="CONNECTIONS">BOTH</field>
    <statement name="INPUTS">
      <block type="input_dummy" id="LL[R;}CBc/%f8+|i:2^X">
        <field name="ALIGN">LEFT</field>
        <statement name="FIELDS">
          <block type="field_static" id="z0mfBzMY3qM,n/Q_@z4|">
            <field name="TEXT">message cache size</field>
            <next>
              <block type="field_number" id="`[de;ilqeB^Ua;mXUBHG">
                <field name="VALUE">200</field>
                <field name="FIELDNAME">size</field>
                <field name="MIN">-1</field>
                <field name="MAX">Infinity</field>
                <field name="PRECISION">0</field>
              </block>
            </next>
          </block>
        </statement>
      </block>
    </statement>
    <value name="TOOLTIP">
      <block type="text" id="d@@lUsM@mDinOVyVgU?R" deletable="false" movable="false">
        <field name="TEXT">Maximum number of messages to cache per channel (-1 for unlimited - don\'t do this without message sweeping, otherwise memory usage will climb indefinitely)</field>
      </block>
    </value>
    <value name="HELPURL">
      <block type="text" id="K0%|$=[I^^]40@3L@0CI" deletable="false" movable="false">
        <field name="TEXT">https://discord.js.org/#/docs/main/stable/typedef/ClientOptions</field>
      </block>
    </value>
    <value name="TOPTYPE">
      <shadow type="type_null" id="r5|A(Vl`P~1cItZp2.Q]"></shadow>
      <block type="type_other" id="s_B)xZ58S%*,$0J^Gzav">
        <field name="TYPE">ClientOption</field>
      </block>
    </value>
    <value name="BOTTOMTYPE">
      <shadow type="type_null" id="$On}+XY4=jgrwNR,oBZq"></shadow>
      <block type="type_other" id="ZZa,_V$-QUz1Nm#n2Rs?">
        <field name="TYPE">ClientOption</field>
      </block>
    </value>
    <value name="COLOUR">
      <block type="colour_hue" id="ga[WCA@52C[Is!Z3ehE|">
        <mutation colour="#5b67a5"></mutation>
        <field name="HUE">230</field>
      </block>
    </value>
  </block>
</xml>

clientoption_apirequestmethod:
<xml xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">
  <block type="factory_base" id="HD+Bt1$0|`x:/m*u(=3N" deletable="false" movable="false" x="0" y="0">
    <mutation connections="BOTH"></mutation>
    <field name="NAME">ClientOption_apiRequestMethod</field>
    <field name="INLINE">AUTO</field>
    <field name="CONNECTIONS">BOTH</field>
    <statement name="INPUTS">
      <block type="input_dummy" id="LL[R;}CBc/%f8+|i:2^X">
        <field name="ALIGN">LEFT</field>
        <statement name="FIELDS">
          <block type="field_static" id="z0mfBzMY3qM,n/Q_@z4|">
            <field name="TEXT">api request via</field>
            <next>
              <block type="field_dropdown" id="^m8SeL^94NI8:svJ-p$2">
                <mutation options="["text","text"]"></mutation>
                <field name="FIELDNAME">method</field>
                <field name="USER0">sequential</field>
                <field name="CPU0">sequential</field>
                <field name="USER1">burst</field>
                <field name="CPU1">burst</field>
              </block>
            </next>
          </block>
        </statement>
      </block>
    </statement>
    <value name="TOOLTIP">
      <block type="text" id="d@@lUsM@mDinOVyVgU?R" deletable="false" movable="false">
        <field name="TEXT">One of sequential or burst. The sequential handler executes all requests in the order they are triggered, whereas the burst handler runs multiple in parallel, and doesn\'t provide the guarantee of any particular order. Burst mode is more likely to hit a 429 ratelimit error by its nature, and is therefore slightly riskier to use.</field>
      </block>
    </value>
    <value name="HELPURL">
      <block type="text" id="K0%|$=[I^^]40@3L@0CI" deletable="false" movable="false">
        <field name="TEXT">https://discord.js.org/#/docs/main/stable/typedef/ClientOptions</field>
      </block>
    </value>
    <value name="TOPTYPE">
      <shadow type="type_null" id="r5|A(Vl`P~1cItZp2.Q]"></shadow>
      <block type="type_other" id="s_B)xZ58S%*,$0J^Gzav">
        <field name="TYPE">ClientOption</field>
      </block>
    </value>
    <value name="BOTTOMTYPE">
      <shadow type="type_null" id="$On}+XY4=jgrwNR,oBZq"></shadow>
      <block type="type_other" id="ZZa,_V$-QUz1Nm#n2Rs?">
        <field name="TYPE">ClientOption</field>
      </block>
    </value>
    <value name="COLOUR">
      <block type="colour_hue" id="ga[WCA@52C[Is!Z3ehE|">
        <mutation colour="#5b67a5"></mutation>
        <field name="HUE">230</field>
      </block>
    </value>
  </block>
</xml>
clientoption_messagecachelifetime:
<xml xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml">
  <block type="factory_base" id="HD+Bt1$0|`x:/m*u(=3N" deletable="false" movable="false" x="0" y="0">
    <mutation connections="BOTH"></mutation>
    <field name="NAME">ClientOption_messageCacheLifetime</field>
    <field name="INLINE">AUTO</field>
    <field name="CONNECTIONS">BOTH</field>
    <statement name="INPUTS">
      <block type="input_dummy" id="LL[R;}CBc/%f8+|i:2^X">
        <field name="ALIGN">LEFT</field>
        <statement name="FIELDS">
          <block type="field_static" id="z0mfBzMY3qM,n/Q_@z4|">
            <field name="TEXT">message cache time</field>
            <next>
              <block type="field_number" id="`[de;ilqeB^Ua;mXUBHG">
                <field name="VALUE">0</field>
                <field name="FIELDNAME">time</field>
                <field name="MIN">0</field>
                <field name="MAX">Infinity</field>
                <field name="PRECISION">0</field>
              </block>
            </next>
          </block>
        </statement>
      </block>
    </statement>
    <value name="TOOLTIP">
      <block type="text" id="d@@lUsM@mDinOVyVgU?R" deletable="false" movable="false">
        <field name="TEXT">How long a message should stay in the cache until it is considered sweepable (in seconds, 0 for forever)</field>
      </block>
    </value>
    <value name="HELPURL">
      <block type="text" id="K0%|$=[I^^]40@3L@0CI" deletable="false" movable="false">
        <field name="TEXT">https://discord.js.org/#/docs/main/stable/typedef/ClientOptions</field>
